title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama CLI and server for running large language models locally with a simple API and model registry.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama, enabling programmatic chat, generate, embed, and pull/push operations.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node.js and browsers to interact with the Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama models as LangChain LLMs and embeddings.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama supporting multi-model conversations, code highlighting, and RAG.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client library for Ollama providing synchronous and asynchronous APIs for chat, generate, and embeddings.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate offering strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API with tokio support.

title: Ollama-GPT4All-UI
summary: Cross-platform desktop UI that can connect to both Ollama and GPT4All backends for local chat.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Lightweight Node CLI tool for interactive chatting with any Ollama model from the terminal.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models to be used as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot-like VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline code suggestions.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat interface template demonstrating how to build a web UI around Ollama with session memory.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama server and models to Kubernetes clusters with GPU support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem providing a simple client for Ollama with ActiveModel-like interfaces for chat and generate.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Rust CLI utility for interactive chat sessions with Ollama models, featuring syntax highlighting and history.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Collection of Docker Compose stacks combining Ollama with Open-WebUI, Postgres, and optional GPU runtime.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Community node for n8n workflow automation that enables calling Ollama chat or generate steps inside flows.

title: ollama-go
summary: Unofficial but feature-complete Go client for Ollama with context support and model management helpers.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal reference implementation of Retrieval-Augmented Generation using Ollama embeddings and Chroma vector store.

title: ollama-zsh-plugin
summary: Zsh plugin adding autocompletion and handy aliases for the ollama CLI tool.
